it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client

Class ClientSocketInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client.ClientSocketInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkInterface

    public class ClientSocketInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkInterface
    Socket version of the connection interface

    Create two channels for the socket output and two for input, respectively for Strings and Objects

        public boolean connect()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the four socket streams
        Specified by:
        connect in interface NetworkInterface
        Returns:
        true if initialization has been successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't manage to close the socket when the streams initialization failed
